tool.name: tool_9
tool.summary: Creates for a given grid geographic coordinate information, i.e. two grids specifying the longitude and latitude for each cell. The coordinate system of the input grid has to be defined. Projection routines make use of the Proj.4 Cartographic Projections library. Proj.4 was originally developed by Gerald Evenden and later continued by the United States Department of the Interior, Geological Survey (USGS). Proj.4 Version is 7.2.1 Proj.4 Homepage
